Package com.intellij.psi

Interface PsiDocumentManager.Listener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    PsiDocumentManager

    public static interface PsiDocumentManager.Listener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Listener for receiving notifications about creation of Document and PsiFile instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void documentCreated(Document document, PsiFile psiFile)
      Called when a document instance is created for a file.
      default void fileCreated(PsiFile file, Document document)
      Called when a file instance is created for a document.

    • Method Detail

      • documentCreated

        void documentCreated(Document document,
                     PsiFile psiFile)
        Called when a document instance is created for a file.
        Parameters:
        document - the created document instance.
        psiFile - the file for which the document was created.
        See Also:
        PsiDocumentManager.getDocument(PsiFile)

      • fileCreated

        default void fileCreated(PsiFile file,
                         Document document)
        Called when a file instance is created for a document.
        Parameters:
        file - the created file instance.
        document - the document for which the file was created.
        See Also:
        PsiDocumentManager.getDocument(PsiFile)
